tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE athlete_nutrition_plans(
    athlete_id INT,
    plan_name VARCHAR(255),
    protein_goal INT,
    carb_goal INT,
    fat_goal INT
);

CREATE TABLE intake_habits(
    athlete_id INT,
    meal_time TIME,
    meal_type ENUM('Breakfast', 'Lunch', 'Dinner'),
    meal_description TEXT,
    calories_consumed INT
);

CREATE TABLE athlete_information (
    athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE nutrition_plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(50),
    protein_target FLOAT,
    carb_target FLOAT,
    fat_target FLOAT,
    calories_target INT
);

CREATE TABLE dietary_preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    preference_name VARCHAR(50),
    is_vegan BOOLEAN,
    is_gluten_free BOOLEAN,
    is_diabetic_friendly BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE intake_habits (
    intake_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT,
    plan_id INT,
    meal_number INT,
    date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE athlete (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INTEGER,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    weight DECIMAL,
    height DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE nutrition_plan (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(50),
    plan_type VARCHAR(20),
    calories INTEGER,
    protein_gr INTEGER,
    carb_gr INTEGER,
    fat_gr INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE dietary_preference (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    preference_name VARCHAR(50),
    dietary_restrictions TEXT,
    favorite_foods TEXT[],
    allergies TEXT[]
);

CREATE TABLE intake_habits (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INTEGER,
    date DATE,
    calories_consumed INTEGER,
    protein_consumed INTEGER,
    carb_consumed INTEGER,
    fat_consumed INTEGER
);
